articles.title: Halley McVeigh

              Halley McVeigh
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            My name is Halley and I am a graduate student at the Bren School of Environmental Science & Management where I specialize in Coastal Marine Resources Management with a focus in Strategic Environmental Communication and Media.
            I’m interested in researching and developing collaborative solutions that are both restorative for the ecosystem and beneficial for communities. I came to Santa Barbara (UCSB) from Maine where I worked in the oyster aquaculture field for years, combining my love for applied research and working on the water. In my free time I enjoy cooking and baking and love to be outdoors - camping, hiking, running, gardening, and anything at the ocean!
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Halley McVeigh

I came to Santa Barbara (UCSB) from Maine where I worked in the oyster aquaculture field for years, combining my love for applied research and working on the water. In my free time I enjoy cooking and baking and love to be outdoors - camping, hiking, running, gardening, and anything at the ocean!
